sqlMap.select: select bno, btitle, to_char(bdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as bdate, mid, bstatus, bview_cnt, rno_cnt from board order by bno desc
sqlMap.update: update board set bview_cnt=bview_cnt+1 where bno=#bno#
sqlMap.insert: insert into board values ( board_seq.nextval, #mid#, #btitle#, sysdate, #bstatus#, #bview_cnt#, #bimage#, #bcontent#, #rno_cnt# )
sqlMap.update: update board set bstatus='진행완료' where bno=#bno#
sqlMap.select: SELECT bno, btitle, bimage FROM board WHERE bdate=(SELECT max(bdate) FROM board)
